entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the calm and serene character who refuses to let Harry out of the room. He is described as having a 'hatefully calm old face'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the character who is trying to escape from Dumbledore's room. He is described as being 'shaking from head to foot' and 'roaring' in anger.

relationships.description: Dumbledore refuses to let Harry out of the room, as described by Dumbledore's response: 'No'. This relationship is established through their conversation where Dumbledore repeatedly says 'no' to Harry's requests to be released.
